column2: His Malevolent Majesty$Unlimited$DARK$[Fiend/Effect]$$$$$5$2400$1000$$$$If this card is Tribute Summoned: You can destroy any number of face-up monsters your opponent controls whose combined ATK is less than or equal to the original ATK of the monster Tributed to Tribute Summon this card.$$$Activates upon Tribute Summon$Trigger$
